function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Economic downturn and recession due to covid-19 crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Declining trust in national currency and economic policy","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of vaccination availability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in implementing new ways of interaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation of services to the new normal","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through physical interaction in retail spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personalized experiences leading to customer dissatisfaction and reduced loyalty.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing use of face masks and sanitizers may lead to environmental pollution and waste management issues.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote services and virtual try-ons may lead to a decrease in in-store foot traffic, impacting physical retailers and the local economy.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased use of technology for shelf monitoring and clean surfaces may lead to data privacy and cybersecurity risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented transmissibility and variety in symptoms of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic uncertainty and vulnerability to a second wave of infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Little prospect of widely available vaccine and second global outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased use of masks and mask production can contribute to environmental waste and pollution","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid production and adoption of new mask technologies may lead to quality and safety issues","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of reusable masks may lead to improper maintenance and cleaning, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term effects on consumer psyche from pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reluctance to engage in consumer research during pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Littering of masks and gloves in public spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mandatory mask wearing creating high demand","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global supply chain vulnerabilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rise of counterfeit products","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of coffee yarn and silver nanotechnology in the face mask","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reuse of the mask filter without proper cleaning or replacement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Antimicrobial face mask becoming a potential source of viral transmission if not handled properly","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential skepticism towards the performance of the eco-friendly face mask","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate decomposition of the coffee face mask after being discarded","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of ineffective protection against air particulate matter","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collection of used coffee from various sources may introduce contamination and pathogens into the production process.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Importing materials from different locations increases the risk of introducing foreign pathogens and contaminants into the manufacturing process.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High demand and production volume may lead to insufficient monitoring of hygiene and cleanliness in the production process, increasing the risk of contamination and spread of contagious diseases through the shoes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Haze particles can affect the heart and lungs, especially in people with chronic heart or lung disease.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Worsening air quality leading to high demand for n95 masks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental pollution from fashion industry contributing to carbon emissions and ocean pollution.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Production and distribution of face masks during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air pollution and its impact on public health","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High percentage of consumers adopting new behaviors and habits due to covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New habits and behaviors adopted during covid-19 crisis likely to persist.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of face masks as a result of air quality concerns and the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on green brand equity in the context of covid-19 post-pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Innovative products and marketing strategies in response to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on consumer behaviors and attitudes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customers underestimating the risk of contagion due to strong brand loyalty and trust","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate risk assessment and management of contagion in brand experience environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overemphasis on customer experience and brand image leading to negligence of contagion risk","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in greenwashing leading to consumer skepticism about brand promises to preserve the run","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Asymmetry of information in the marketplace","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The text discusses the impact of brand image on consumer attitudes and brand equity, but does not address the risk of contagious diseases propagation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious spread of misinformation about green brands and environmental benefits leading to consumer deception and confusion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
